verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. Out of the <S%H4615>depths<s%> have I <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah.
Lord <S%H136><s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>: Let thine <S%H241>ears<s%> be <S%H7183>attentive<s%> To the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%>.
If <S%H3050>thou<s%>, Jehovah, shouldest <S%H8104>mark<s%> <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, who could <S%H5975>stand<s%>?
But there is <S%H5547>forgiveness<s%> with <S%H3372>thee<s%>, That thou mayest be feared.
I <S%H6960>wait<s%> for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, my <S%H5315>soul<s%> doth <S%H6960>wait<s%>, And in his <S%H1697>word<s%> do I <S%H3176>hope<s%>.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> waiteth for the <S%H136>Lord<s%> More than <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> wait for the <S%H1242>morning<s%>; <S%H8104>Yea<s%>, more than watchmen for the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.
O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H3176>hope<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; For with <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> there is <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>, And with him is <S%H7235>plenteous<s%> <S%H6304>redemption<s%>.
And he will <S%H6299>redeem<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> From all his <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>.
